actions.text: Amendment SA 4848 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 96 - 1. Record Vote Number: 226.

Amendment SA 4848 proposed by Senator Coburn. (consideration: CR S8680-8681, S8691, S8703; text: CR S8680) To require notice to Congress and the public on earmarks of funds available to the Department of Defense.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 4848 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 96 - 1. Record Vote Number: 226.

purpose: To require notice to Congress and the public on earmarks of funds available to the Department of Defense.
